Class AffineCipher

extends Object
    A class to implement the Affine Cipher.
    Version:
    Project CS56, S13, 05/29/2013
    Author:
    Miranda Aperghis, Callum Steele

      • encrypt

        public String encrypt(String word)
        Encryption algorithm for the affine cipher. Each character is multiplied by keyA and then keyB is added, mod 26 to get the new encrypted character.
        Parameters:
        word - a plaintext word that is to be encrypted
        Returns:
        the ciphertext (the encrypted plaintext)

      • decrypt

        public String decrypt(String word)
        Decryption algorithm for the affine cipher.
        Parameters:
        word - a ciphertext word the is to be decrypted
        Returns:
        the plaintext (the decrypted ciphertext)
